reviews.title: Okay
reviews.text: The hotel is in a good location. The rooms are quite small but clean and tastefully decorated. The breakfast on sunday is from 8-12. We got down to the restaurant and the receptionist told us that the breakfast will start at 8.15 so we went back to our room. 8.20 we went back to the restaurant to find that they just started setting up everything. We didn't have time to wait because we had to catch the flight to Copenhagen. I think it's not Scandinavian custom to apologise for the inconvinience.
